content.question: public static int mystery(int value) { int sum = 0; int[] arr = {1, 4, 2, 5, 10, 3, 6, 4}; for (int item : arr) { if (item > value) { sum += item; } } return sum; } What value is returned as a result of the call mystery(4) ?

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
